header: BRIEF-Avis announces Google Home integration with AI capabilities
body:
* Says to launch a Google Assistant action for Google Home, available next month​

* Through a secure integration with Avis, travelers can use Google Home to make or modify current reservations and review past trips Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

header: BRIEF-Brightcove Inc - has enabled TVNZ to launch its video streaming service on Google Chromecast
body: * Brightcove Inc - has enabled TVNZ to launch its video streaming service on Google Chromecast Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
